data.title: The People vs. Larry Flynt - Full Cast & Crew
data.meta_description: Learn more about the full cast of The People vs. Larry Flynt with news, photos, videos and more at TV Guide
data.text:
79 Metascore

1996

2 hr 9 mins

Drama

R

Watchlist

Where to Watch

Woody Harrelson earned a Best Actor nomination as brassy Hustler publisher Larry Flynt in this bold biography. The film follows Flynt from his childhood as a moonshine runner to his highly publicized court battles on obscenity and libel charges, which developed into an ongoing war to defend his freedom of speech. Courtney Love costars as Flynt's stripper wife. Edward Norton, James Cromwell, Crispin Glover, James Carville, Brett Harrelson.
